bodyText: Finland’s biggest Beer Pong tournament Finnish Series of Beer Pong is coming once again and for the first time in the city of Turku! The grand prize for the tournament is a Beer Pong centered trip to Europe for two! The prize includes flights, accommodation and tournament tickets! (Up to 500€).

The Finnish Series of Beer Pong is held on saturday 23.11.2023 from 14.00 (the starting time is subject to minor changes) at T-talo (Vanha Hämeentie 29, 20540 Turku) Ticket sales for the event begins on 21.8.2024 18.00 in Kide.App. The early bird tickets for THE BEER PONG TOURNAMENT of the year are only 20€ per team. The tickets grants the team an access to the tournament, lowered prices on game drinks and to the after party. There is room for 96 teams and starting at 1.10. the ticket price is going to up to 24€, so act fast for cheaper tickets. A team has to purchase only one ticket.
The tournament is arranged in co-operation by Aalto Beer Pong, Beer Pong Turku and Lappeenranta Beer Pong. Tournament is played on WSOBP rules. Please see the rules in advance here.
